name: politico
text: Former special counsel Robert Mueller broke a nearly year-long silence on Saturday to defend his office’s investigation of links between the Trump campaign and Russia and its indictment of Roger Stone https://t.co/mAMaoz4DrA

name: politico
text: Sens. Mitt Romney and Pat Toomey condemned President Trump’s decision to commute the prison sentence of his longtime confidant Roger Stone — the first elected Republicans to denounce the president’s Friday night move https://t.co/hYDAeUbavs
